titleStmt.title: The great prerogative of a private life by way of dialogue / written by the learned Horatius Tubero or The Sieur Moth-le-Vayer.
titleStmt.author: La Mothe Le Vayer, François de, 1583-1672.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.C. for L.C. and sold by Charles Blount ...,

notesStmt.note: Translation of his "De la vie privée" from his "Cinq dialogues faits à l'imitation des anciens."
This item appears at reel 499:29 and at reel 1311:11.
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
